name: ERASED BACKROOMS
description:
Wake up in a strange and nightmarish place
 full of random buildings and hostile creatures.
Where the only way to escape is by solving 
the maze. Keep your guard up and watch your back.
 You are not alone in these halls.
 Stealth will help you evade the monsters that
 rule this place. 
 Overcome all the traps in this new horror
 adventure and reveal your dark destiny. 
ERASED BACKROOMS!!
